metadata.title: CVE-2014-3970 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: The pa_rtp_recv function in modules/rtp/rtp.c in the module-rtp-recv modulein PulseAudio 5.0 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (assertion failure and abort) via an empty UDP packet.

criterions.comment: pulseaudio: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
